I co-organized a full-day workshop at [ACII 2024](https://acii-conf.net/2024/) on "Embracing Ambiguity and Subjectivity in Emotion Research" (EASE). Please visit the [workshop website](https://ease.ewi.tudelft.nl/) for more information. I also gave an invited talk, described below.

- Girard, J. M. (2024). *Theoretical foundations of ambiguity and subjectivity.* Invited talk presented at the Embracing Ambiguity and Subjectivity in Emotion Research Workshop, AAAC International Conference on Affective Computing and Intelligent Interaction (ACII), Glasgow, UK.
